short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple bookmarks search engine and manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the OkBookmarks Chrome Extension! This powerful tool allows you to seamlessly integrate your web browsing with OkBookmarks, enhancing your bookmark management.
Key Features:
	•	Intelligent Indexing: Automatically scrape and index the content of your bookmarks for easy searching.
	•	Bulk URL Import: Effortlessly add multiple bookmarks at once, keeping your collection organized.
	•	Natural Search Functionality: Quickly find the projects or sites you need without remembering exact names.
	•	User-Friendly Interface: Navigate and manage your bookmarks with ease directly from your browser.
Transform how you interact with your bookmarks and elevate your productivity with OkBookmarks!
